trans-unit.source: Creates a new print stream, with the specified OutputStream, automatic line flushing and charset.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的打印流,使用指定的OutputStream、自动换行和字符集。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new print stream, with the specified OutputStream, automatic line flushing and charset. This convenience constructor creates the necessary intermediate OutputStreamWriter, which will encode characters using the provided charset.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的OutputStream，自动行刷新和字符集创建新的打印流。此便利的构造函数创建必要的中间 OutputStreamWriter ，它将使用提供的字符集对字符进行编码。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文件名创建新的打印流，而不进行自动行刷新。这个便利的构造函数创建必要的中间 OutputStreamWriter ，它将使用Java虚拟机实例的默认字符集对字符进行编码。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的具有一个字符的推送缓冲区的推送阅读器。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的具有给定大小的推送缓冲区的推送阅读器。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new random number generator using a single long seed.
trans-unit.target: 使用单个 long 种子创建一个新的随机数生成器。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new random number generator using a single long seed. The seed is the initial value of the internal state of the pseudorandom number generator which is maintained by method next(int).
trans-unit.target: 使用单个 long 种子创建一个新的随机数生成器。种子是通过方法 next(int) 维护的伪随机数生成器内部状态的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new random number generator using a single long seed. The seed is the initial value of the internal state of the pseudorandom number generator which is maintained by method next(int).
trans-unit.target: 使用单个 long 种子创建一个新的随机数生成器。种子是由方法 next(int) 维护的伪随机数生成器内部状态的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new random number generator.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的随机数发生器。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new random number generator. This constructor sets the seed of the random number generator to a value very likely to be distinct from any other invocation of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的随机数生成器。该构造函数将随机数生成器的种子值设置为一个很可能与其他构造函数的调用不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new relation with the initial set of relations contained in the array of relations passed in.
trans-unit.target: 用传入的关系数组中包含的初始关系集创建一个新关系。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new relation with the initial set of relations contained in the array of relations passed in. Duplicate entries are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 用传入的关系数组中的初始关系集创建一个新的关系。重复的条目将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new scrolling list initialized to display the specified number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的滚动列表,初始化为显示指定行数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new scrolling list initialized to display the specified number of rows. Note that if zero rows are specified, then the list will be created with a default of four rows. Also note that the number of visible rows in the list cannot be changed after it has been created. If the value of multipleMode is true, then the user can select multiple items from the list. If it is false, only one item at a time can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的滚动列表，初始化以显示指定的行数。请注意，如果指定零行，则将使用默认的四行创建列表。还要注意，列表中的可见行数在创建后就无法更改。如果 multipleMode 的值为 true ，那么用户可以从列表中选择多个项目。如果为 false ，一次只能选择一项。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new scrolling list initialized with the specified number of visible lines.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的滚动列表,初始化为指定的可见行数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new scrolling list initialized with the specified number of visible lines. By default, multiple selections are not allowed. Note that this is a convenience method for List(rows, false). Also note that the number of visible rows in the list cannot be changed after it has been created.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的滚动列表，并以指定数量的可见行初始化。默认情况下，不允许多项选择。请注意，这是 List(rows, false) 的便捷方法。还要注意，列表中的可见行数在创建后就无法更改。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new scrolling list.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的滚动列表。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new scrolling list. By default, there are four visible lines and multiple selections are not allowed. Note that this is a convenience method for List(0, false). Also note that the number of visible lines in the list cannot be changed after it has been created.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的滚动列表。默认情况下，有四个可见行，并且不允许多项选择。请注意，这是 List(0, false) 的便捷方法。另请注意，列表中的可见行数创建后便无法更改。

It does not locate providers in unnamed modules. The ordering that the service loader's iterator and stream locate providers and yield elements is as follows:

trans-unit.source: Creates a new short buffer that shares this buffer's content.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的短缓冲区,共享这个缓冲区的内容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new soft reference that refers to the given object and is registered with the given queue.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个指向给定对象的新软引用,并在给定队列中注册。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new soft reference that refers to the given object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个指向给定对象的新软引用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new soft reference that refers to the given object. The new reference is not registered with any queue.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个指向给定对象的新软引用。新引用没有在任何队列中注册。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new source file and returns an object to allow writing to it.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的源文件,并返回一个对象以允许写入它。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new source file and returns an object to allow writing to it. A source file for a type, or a package can be created. The file's name and path (relative to the root output location for source files) are based on the name of the item to be declared in that file as well as the specified module for the item (if any). If more than one type is being declared in a single file (that is, a single compilation unit), the name of the file should correspond to the name of the principal top-level type (the public one, for example).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的源文件并返回一个对象以允许对其进行写入。可以创建类型的源文件或包。文件的名称和路径（相对于源文件的根输出位置）基于要在该文件中声明的项目的名称以及该项目的指定模块（如果有）。如果在单个文件（即，单个编译单元）中声明了多个类型，则文件名应与主体顶级类型的名称（例如，公共类型）相对应。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new source file and returns an object to allow writing to it. The file's name and path (relative to the root output location for source files) are based on the type to be declared in that file. If more than one type is being declared, the name of the principal top-level type (the public one, for example) should be used. A source file can also be created to hold information about a package, including package annotations. To create a source file for a named package, have name be the package's name followed by ".package-info"; to create a source file for an unnamed package, use "package-info".
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的源文件并返回一个对象以允许对其进行写入。文件的名称和路径（相对于源文件的根输出位置）基于要在该文件中声明的类型。如果声明了一种以上的类型，则应使用主体顶级类型的名称（例如，公共类型）。还可以创建源文件来保存有关软件包的信息，包括软件包批注。要为命名包创建源文件，请将 name 作为包的名称，后跟 ".package-info" ;要为未命名的软件包创建源文件，请使用 "package-info" 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new state with the initial set of states contained in the array of states passed in.
trans-unit.target: 用传入的状态数组中的初始状态集创建一个新的状态。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new state with the initial set of states contained in the array of states passed in. Duplicate entries are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用传入的状态数组中包含的初始状态集创建一个新的状态。重复的条目将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new strategy for multi-buffering on this component with the required buffer capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 在该组件上创建一个新的多缓冲策略,具有所需的缓冲能力。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new strategy for multi-buffering on this component with the required buffer capabilities. This is useful, for example, if only accelerated memory or page flipping is desired (as specified by the buffer capabilities).
trans-unit.target: 在这个组件上创建一个新的多缓冲策略,具有所需的缓冲能力。例如,如果只需要加速内存或翻页(由缓冲能力指定),这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new strategy for multi-buffering on this component.
trans-unit.target: 在该组件上创建一个新的多缓冲策略。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new strategy for multi-buffering on this component. Multi-buffering is useful for rendering performance. This method attempts to create the best strategy available with the number of buffers supplied. It will always create a BufferStrategy with that number of buffers. A page-flipping strategy is attempted first, then a blitting strategy using accelerated buffers. Finally, an unaccelerated blitting strategy is used.
trans-unit.target: 为该组件上的多缓冲创建新的策略。多缓冲对于渲染性能很有用。此方法尝试使用提供的缓冲区数量来创建最佳策略。它将始终使用该数量的缓冲区创建 BufferStrategy 。首先尝试页面翻转策略，然后尝试使用加速缓冲区的blitting策略。最后，使用了不加速的发短信策略。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new string reader.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的字符串阅读器。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的定时器任务。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的计时器，该计时器的关联线程具有指定的名称，并且可以指定为作为守护程序运行。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new timer whose associated thread has the specified name, and may be specified to run as a daemon.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的计时器，该计时器的关联线程具有指定的名称，并且可以指定为作为守护程序运行。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的定时器,其关联的线程具有指定的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new timer whose associated thread may be specified to run as a daemon.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的计时器，可以将其关联的线程指定为作为守护程序运行。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new timer whose associated thread may be specified to run as a daemon. A daemon thread is called for if the timer will be used to schedule repeating "maintenance activities", which must be performed as long as the application is running, but should not prolong the lifetime of the application.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的计时器，可以将其关联的线程指定为作为守护程序运行。如果将使用计时器安排重复的“维护活动”，则必须调用守护线程，只要应用程序正在运行，就必须执行该线程，但不应延长应用程序的生命周期。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new timer whose associated thread may be specified to run as a daemon. A daemon thread is called for if the timer will be used to schedule repeating "maintenance activities", which must be performed as long as the application is running, but should not prolong the lifetime of the application.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的计时器，可以将其关联的线程指定为作为守护程序运行。如果计时器将用于安排重复的“维护活动”，则将调用守护程序线程，只要应用程序正在运行，就必须执行该线程，但不应延长应用程序的生命周期。

trans-unit.source: Creates a property resource bundle from an InputStream. The property file read with this constructor must be encoded in ISO-8859-1.

trans-unit.source: Creates a property resource bundle from an InputStream. This constructor reads the property file in UTF-8 by default. If a MalformedInputException or an UnmappableCharacterException occurs on reading the input stream, then the PropertyResourceBundle instance resets to the state before the exception, re-reads the input stream in ISO-8859-1 and continues reading. If the system property java.util.PropertyResourceBundle.encoding is set to either "ISO-8859-1" or "UTF-8", the input stream is solely read in that encoding, and throws the exception if it encounters an invalid sequence. Other encoding values are ignored for this system property. The system property is read and evaluated when initializing this class. Changing or removing the property has no effect after the initialization.
trans-unit.target: 从 InputStream 创建属性资源束。默认情况下，此构造函数读取UTF-8中的属性文件。如果在读取输入流时发生 MalformedInputException 或 UnmappableCharacterException ，则PropertyResourceBundle实例将重置为异常之前的状态，然后重新读取 ISO-8859-1 中的输入流并继续读取。如果系统属性为 java.util.PropertyResourceBundle.encoding 设置为“ ISO-8859-1”或“ UTF-8”，则仅以该编码方式读取输入流，如果遇到无效序列，则将引发异常。此系统属性将忽略其他编码值。初始化此类时，将读取并评估system属性。初始化后更改或删除属性无效。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rendering, given a RenderContext and a ParameterBlock containing the operation's sources and parameters. The output is a RenderedImage that takes the RenderContext into account to determine its dimensions and placement on the image plane. This method houses the "intelligence" that allows a rendering-independent operation to adapt to a specific RenderContext.

trans-unit.source: Creates a row of views that will fit within the layout span of the row. This is called by the layout method. This is implemented to fill the row by repeatedly calling the createView method until the available span has been exhausted, a forced break was encountered, or the createView method returned null. If the remaining span was exhausted, the adjustRow method will be called to perform adjustments to the row to try and make it fit into the given span.
trans-unit.target: 创建一行适合于该行布局跨度的视图。这是由布局方法调用的。通过反复调用createView方法来实现对行的填充,直到可用的跨度用完,遇到强制中断,或者createView方法返回null。如果剩余的跨度用完了,就会调用adjustRow方法对行进行调整,尽量使其适合给定的跨度。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of offset/span pairs representing how to lay out a set of components end-to-end.
trans-unit.target: 创建一组偏移量/跨度对,表示如何端到端布局一组组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of offset/span pairs representing how to lay out a set of components end-to-end. This method requires that you specify the total amount of space to be allocated, the size requirements for each component to be placed (specified as an array of SizeRequirements), and the total size requirement of the set of components. You can get the total size requirement by invoking the getTiledSizeRequirements method. The components will be tiled in the forward direction with offsets increasing from 0.
trans-unit.target: 创建一组偏移量/跨度对,表示如何端到端摆放一组组件。该方法需要你指定要分配的空间总量、每个要放置的组件的尺寸要求(以SizeRequirements数组的形式指定)以及组件集的总尺寸要求。你可以通过调用getTiledSizeRequirements方法来获得总的尺寸要求。组件将以偏移量从0开始递增的方式向前进方向进行平铺。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of offset/span pairs representing how to lay out a set of components end-to-end. This method requires that you specify the total amount of space to be allocated, the size requirements for each component to be placed (specified as an array of SizeRequirements), and the total size requirement of the set of components. You can get the total size requirement by invoking the getTiledSizeRequirements method. This method also requires a flag indicating whether components should be tiled in the forward direction (offsets increasing from 0) or reverse direction (offsets decreasing from the end of the allocated space). The forward direction represents components tiled from left to right or top to bottom. The reverse direction represents components tiled from right to left or bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: 创建一组偏移量/跨度对,表示如何端到端摆放一组组件。该方法需要你指定要分配的空间总量、每个要放置的组件的尺寸要求(以SizeRequirements数组的形式指定)以及组件集的总尺寸要求。你可以通过调用getTiledSizeRequirements方法来获得总的尺寸要求。该方法还需要一个标志,指示组件是否应该按正向(偏移量从0开始增加)或反向(偏移量从分配空间的末端开始减少)进行平铺。正向表示从左到右或从上到下的组件平铺。反方向代表从右到左或从下到上平铺的组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of offset/span pairs specifying how to lay out a set of components with the specified alignments.
trans-unit.target: 创建一组偏移/跨度对,指定如何用指定的走线布置一组组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of offset/span pairs specifying how to lay out a set of components with the specified alignments. The resulting span allocations will overlap, with each one fitting as well as possible into the given total allocation. This method requires that you specify the total amount of space to be allocated, the size requirements for each component to be placed (specified as an array of SizeRequirements), and the total size requirements of the set of components (only the alignment field of which is actually used) You can get the total size requirement by invoking getAlignedSizeRequirements. This method also requires a flag indicating whether normal or reverse alignment should be performed. With normal alignment the value 0.0f represents the left/top edge of the component to be aligned. With reverse alignment, 0.0f represents the right/bottom edge.
trans-unit.target: 创建一组偏移量/跨度对,指定如何用指定的排列布局一组组件。由此产生的跨度分配将重叠,每一个跨度都尽可能地适合给定的总分配。这个方法需要你指定要分配的空间总量,每个要放置的组件的尺寸要求(指定为SizeRequirements数组),以及一组组件的总尺寸要求(实际只使用其中的对齐字段)你可以通过调用getAlignedSizeRequirements来获得总尺寸要求。这个方法还需要一个标志,表示应该执行正常对齐还是反向对齐。在正常对齐时,值0.0f代表要对齐的组件的左/上边缘。反向对齐时,0.0f代表右/底边。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy.

trans-unit.source: Creates a single-threaded executor that can schedule commands to run after a given delay, or to execute periodically.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个单线程执行器,它可以安排命令在给定的延迟后运行,或定期执行。

trans-unit.source: Creates a single-threaded executor that can schedule commands to run after a given delay, or to execute periodically. (Note however that if this single thread terminates due to a failure during execution prior to shutdown, a new one will take its place if needed to execute subsequent tasks.) Tasks are guaranteed to execute sequentially, and no more than one task will be active at any given time. Unlike the otherwise equivalent newScheduledThreadPool(1) the returned executor is guaranteed not to be reconfigurable to use additional threads.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个单线程执行器，该执行器可以安排命令在给定的延迟后运行或定期执行。 （但是请注意，如果该单线程由于在关闭之前执行期间由于执行失败而终止，则在需要执行新任务时将使用新线程代替。）保证任务按顺序执行，并且活动的任务不超过一个在任何给定时间。与其他等效的 newScheduledThreadPool(1) 不同，保证返回的执行程序不能重新配置为使用其他线程。

trans-unit.source: Creates a single-threaded executor that can schedule commands to run after a given delay, or to execute periodically. (Note however that if this single thread terminates due to a failure during execution prior to shutdown, a new one will take its place if needed to execute subsequent tasks.) Tasks are guaranteed to execute sequentially, and no more than one task will be active at any given time. Unlike the otherwise equivalent newScheduledThreadPool(1, threadFactory) the returned executor is guaranteed not to be reconfigurable to use additional threads.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个单线程执行器，该执行器可以安排命令在给定的延迟后运行或定期执行。 （但是请注意，如果该单线程由于在关闭之前执行期间由于执行失败而终止，则在需要执行新任务时将使用新线程代替。）保证任务按顺序执行，并且活动的任务不超过一个在任何给定时间。与其他等效的 newScheduledThreadPool(1, threadFactory) ，保证返回的执行程序不可重新配置为使用其他线程。

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread pool that can schedule commands to run after a given delay, or to execute periodically.

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread pool that creates new threads as needed, but will reuse previously constructed threads when they are available, and uses the provided ThreadFactory to create new threads when needed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个线程池,根据需要创建新的线程,但会在有线程可用时重复使用之前构建的线程,并在需要时使用提供的ThreadFactory创建新的线程。

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread pool that creates new threads as needed, but will reuse previously constructed threads when they are available.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个线程池,根据需要创建新的线程,但当线程可用时,会重复使用之前构建的线程。

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread pool that creates new threads as needed, but will reuse previously constructed threads when they are available. These pools will typically improve the performance of programs that execute many short-lived asynchronous tasks. Calls to execute will reuse previously constructed threads if available. If no existing thread is available, a new thread will be created and added to the pool. Threads that have not been used for sixty seconds are terminated and removed from the cache. Thus, a pool that remains idle for long enough will not consume any resources. Note that pools with similar properties but different details (for example, timeout parameters) may be created using ThreadPoolExecutor constructors.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个线程池，该线程池根据需要创建新线程，但是将在先前构造的线程可用时重用它们。这些池通常将提高执行许多短期异步任务的程序的性能。如果可用， execute 将重用以前构造的线程。如果没有可用的现有线程，则将创建一个新线程并将其添加到池中。六十秒内未使用的线程将终止并从缓存中删除。因此，保持空闲时间足够长的池不会消耗任何资源。请注意，可以使用 ThreadPoolExecutor 构造函数创建具有相似属性但细节不同（例如，超时参数）的池。

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread pool that maintains enough threads to support the given parallelism level, and may use multiple queues to reduce contention.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个线程池,维护足够的线程来支持给定的并行度级别,并可能使用多个队列来减少争夺。

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread pool that maintains enough threads to support the given parallelism level, and may use multiple queues to reduce contention. The parallelism level corresponds to the maximum number of threads actively engaged in, or available to engage in, task processing. The actual number of threads may grow and shrink dynamically. A work-stealing pool makes no guarantees about the order in which submitted tasks are executed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个线程池,保持足够的线程来支持给定的并行度级别,并可以使用多个队列来减少争夺。并行度级别对应于主动参与或可参与任务处理的最大线程数。线程的实际数量可能会动态地增长和收缩。偷工减料池不保证提交的任务的执行顺序。

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread pool that reuses a fixed number of threads operating off a shared unbounded queue, using the provided ThreadFactory to create new threads when needed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个线程池,重复使用固定数量的线程在共享的非绑定队列中运行,在需要时使用提供的ThreadFactory创建新的线程。

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread pool that reuses a fixed number of threads operating off a shared unbounded queue, using the provided ThreadFactory to create new threads when needed. At any point, at most nThreads threads will be active processing tasks. If additional tasks are submitted when all threads are active, they will wait in the queue until a thread is available. If any thread terminates due to a failure during execution prior to shutdown, a new one will take its place if needed to execute subsequent tasks. The threads in the pool will exist until it is explicitly shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个线程池，该线程池重用固定数量的线程，这些线程在共享的无界队列之外运行，并在需要时使用提供的ThreadFactory创建新线程。在任何时候，最多 nThreads 个线程都是活动的处理任务。如果在所有线程都处于活动状态时提交了其他任务，则它们将在队列中等待，直到某个线程可用为止。如果在关闭之前执行过程中由于执行失败导致任何线程终止，则在执行后续任务时将使用新线程代替。池中的线程将一直存在，直到将其显式 shutdown 为止。

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread pool that reuses a fixed number of threads operating off a shared unbounded queue, using the provided ThreadFactory to create new threads when needed. At any point, at most nThreads threads will be active processing tasks. If additional tasks are submitted when all threads are active, they will wait in the queue until a thread is available. If any thread terminates due to a failure during execution prior to shutdown, a new one will take its place if needed to execute subsequent tasks. The threads in the pool will exist until it is explicitly shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个线程池，该线程池重用固定数量的线程，这些线程在共享的无界队列之外操作，并在需要时使用提供的ThreadFactory创建新线程。在任何时候，最多 nThreads 个线程都是活动的处理任务。如果在所有线程都处于活动状态时提交了其他任务，则它们将在队列中等待，直到某个线程可用为止。如果在关闭之前执行过程中由于执行失败导致任何线程终止，则在执行后续任务时将使用新线程代替。池中的线程将一直存在，直到将其显式 shutdown 为止。

If any thread terminates due to a failure during execution prior to shutdown, a new one will take its place if needed to execute subsequent tasks. The threads in the pool will exist until it is explicitly shutdown.

trans-unit.source: Creates an X500Principal from a string representation of an X.500 distinguished name (ex: "CN=Duke, OU=JavaSoft, O=Sun Microsystems, C=US").
trans-unit.target: 从X.500专有名称的字符串表示 X500Principal 创建X500Principal（例如：“ CN = Duke，OU = JavaSoft，O = Sun Microsystems，C = US”）。

trans-unit.source: Creates an X500Principal from a string representation of an X.500 distinguished name (ex: "CN=Duke, OU=JavaSoft, O=Sun Microsystems, C=US"). The distinguished name must be specified using the grammar defined in RFC 1779 or RFC 2253 (either format is acceptable).
trans-unit.target: 从X.500专有名称的字符串表示 X500Principal 创建X500Principal（例如：“ CN = Duke，OU = JavaSoft，O = Sun Microsystems，C = US”）。必须使用RFC 1779或RFC 2253中定义的语法指定专有名称（两种格式均可接受）。

trans-unit.source: Creates an X500Principal from an InputStream containing the distinguished name in ASN.1 DER encoded form.
trans-unit.target: 从 InputStream 创建一个 X500Principal ，该X500Principal包含ASN.1 DER编码形式的专有名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates an X500Principal from an InputStream containing the distinguished name in ASN.1 DER encoded form. The ASN.1 notation for this structure is supplied in the documentation for X500Principal(byte[] name).
trans-unit.target: 从 InputStream 创建一个 X500Principal ，该X500Principal包含ASN.1 DER编码形式的专有名称。 X500Principal(byte[] name) 的文档中提供了此结构的ASN.1表示法。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的XPath表达式，过滤器和名称空间映射创建 XPathType 实例。复制地图以防止后续修改。

trans-unit.source: Creates an AttributedCharacterIterator instance that provides access to selected contents of this string.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个AttributedCharacterIterator实例,提供对该字符串所选内容的访问。

trans-unit.source: Creates an AttributedCharacterIterator instance that provides access to selected contents of this string. Information about attributes not listed in attributes that the implementor may have need not be made accessible through the iterator. If the list is null, all available attribute information should be made accessible.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个AttributedCharacterIterator实例,提供对该字符串选定内容的访问。实现者可能拥有的未列在属性中的属性信息不需要通过迭代器进行访问。如果列表为空,则应使所有可用的属性信息都能被访问。

trans-unit.source: Creates an AttributedCharacterIterator instance that provides access to the entire contents of this string.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个AttributedCharacterIterator实例,提供对该字符串全部内容的访问。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ECPoint from the specified affine x-coordinate x and affine y-coordinate y.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的仿射x坐标 x 和仿射y坐标 y 创建ECPoint 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ExecutionControl for given packetized input and output.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的packetized输入和输出创建一个执行控制。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ExecutionControl for given packetized input and output. The given InputStream is de-packetized, and content forwarded to ObjectInput and given OutputStreams. The ObjectOutput and values read from the given InputStream are packetized and sent to the given OutputStream.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的打包输入和输出创建一个ExecutionControl。给定的InputStream被去包,内容被转发到ObjectInput和给定的OutputStream。ObjectOutput和从给定InputStream中读取的值被打包并发送到给定OutputStream。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Executor that uses a single worker thread operating off an unbounded queue, and uses the provided ThreadFactory to create a new thread when needed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用单个工作线程在非绑定队列中运行的Executor,并在需要时使用提供的ThreadFactory创建一个新线程。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Executor that uses a single worker thread operating off an unbounded queue, and uses the provided ThreadFactory to create a new thread when needed. Unlike the otherwise equivalent newFixedThreadPool(1, threadFactory) the returned executor is guaranteed not to be reconfigurable to use additional threads.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个执行程序，该执行程序使用在不受限制的队列上操作的单个工作线程，并在需要时使用提供的ThreadFactory创建新线程。与其他等效的 newFixedThreadPool(1, threadFactory) ，保证返回的执行程序不可重新配置为使用其他线程。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Executor that uses a single worker thread operating off an unbounded queue.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用单个工作线程的Executor,该线程在非绑定队列中运行。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Executor that uses a single worker thread operating off an unbounded queue. (Note however that if this single thread terminates due to a failure during execution prior to shutdown, a new one will take its place if needed to execute subsequent tasks.) Tasks are guaranteed to execute sequentially, and no more than one task will be active at any given time. Unlike the otherwise equivalent newFixedThreadPool(1) the returned executor is guaranteed not to be reconfigurable to use additional threads.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个执行程序，该执行程序使用在不受限制的队列上操作的单个工作线程。（但是请注意，如果该单线程由于在关闭之前执行期间由于执行失败而终止，则在需要执行新任务时将使用新线程代替。）保证任务按顺序执行，并且活动的任务不超过一个在任何给定时间。与其他等效的 newFixedThreadPool(1) 不同，保证返回的执行程序不能重新配置为使用其他线程。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ExecutorCompletionService using the supplied executor for base task execution and a LinkedBlockingQueue as a completion queue.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的执行程序（用于执行基本任务）和 LinkedBlockingQueue 作为完成队列来创建ExecutorCompletionService 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ExecutorCompletionService using the supplied executor for base task execution and the supplied queue as its completion queue.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个ExecutorCompletionService,使用所提供的执行器来执行基本任务,并使用所提供的队列作为其完成队列。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ImageIcon from an array of bytes which were read from an image file containing a supported image format, such as GIF, JPEG, or (as of 1.3) PNG.
trans-unit.target: 从一个包含支持的图像格式的图像文件中读取的字节数组中创建一个ImageIcon,如GIF、JPEG或(1.3版本)PNG。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ImageIcon from an array of bytes which were read from an image file containing a supported image format, such as GIF, JPEG, or (as of 1.3) PNG. Normally this array is created by reading an image using Class.getResourceAsStream(), but the byte array may also be statically stored in a class.
trans-unit.target: 从一个包含支持的图像格式的图像文件中读取的字节数组创建一个ImageIcon,如GIF、JPEG或(1.3版本)PNG。通常这个数组是通过使用Class.getResourceAsStream()读取图像来创建的,但是字节数组也可以静态地存储在一个类中。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ImageIcon from an array of bytes which were read from an image file containing a supported image format, such as GIF, JPEG, or (as of 1.3) PNG. Normally this array is created by reading an image using Class.getResourceAsStream(), but the byte array may also be statically stored in a class. If the resulting image has a "comment" property that is a string, then the string is used as the description of this icon.
trans-unit.target: 从一个包含支持的图像格式的图像文件中读取的字节数组创建一个ImageIcon,如GIF、JPEG或(1.3版本)PNG。通常这个数组是通过使用Class.getResourceAsStream()读取图像来创建的,但是字节数组也可以静态地存储在一个类中。如果生成的图像有一个 "注释 "属性是一个字符串,那么这个字符串就会被用作这个图标的描述。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ImageIcon from an image object.
trans-unit.target: 从图像对象创建一个ImageIcon。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ImageIcon from an image object. If the image has a "comment" property that is a string, then the string is used as the description of this icon.
trans-unit.target: 从一个图像对象创建一个ImageIcon。如果图像的 "注释 "属性是一个字符串,那么这个字符串将被用作这个图标的描述。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ImageIcon from the image.

trans-unit.target: 从指定的URL创建一个ImageIcon。通过使用MediaTracker监控图像的加载状态,预加载图像。

trans-unit.target: 从指定的URL创建一个ImageIcon。通过使用MediaTracker监控图像的加载状态来预加载图像。图标的描述被初始化为URL的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ImageIcon from the specified file.

trans-unit.source: Creates an ImageIcon from the specified file. The image will be preloaded by using MediaTracker to monitor the loading state of the image.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的文件中创建一个ImageIcon。通过使用MediaTracker监控图像的加载状态来预加载图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ImageIcon from the specified file. The image will be preloaded by using MediaTracker to monitor the loading state of the image. The specified String can be a file name or a file path. When specifying a path, use the Internet-standard forward-slash ("/") as a separator. (The string is converted to an URL, so the forward-slash works on all systems.) For example, specify:
trans-unit.target: 从指定的文件中创建一个ImageIcon。图像将通过使用MediaTracker监控图像的加载状态而被预加载。指定的字符串可以是文件名或文件路径。指定路径时,请使用互联网标准的正斜线 ("/")作为分隔符。字符串会被转换为URL,所以前斜线在所有系统上都适用)。例如,指定

trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用给定charset解码器的InputStreamReader。

trans-unit.source: Creates an InputStreamReader that uses the given charset.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用给定字符集的InputStreamReader。

trans-unit.target: 使用 iv 中的字节作为IV 创建IvParameterSpec对象。

trans-unit.target: 使用 iv 中的前 len 个字节（从包含 offset 开始）作为IV 创建IvParameterSpec对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates an MBeanServerNotification object specifying object names of the MBeans that caused the notification and the specified notification type.

trans-unit.source: Creates an ObjectInputStream that reads from the specified InputStream.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个从指定的InputStream中读取的ObjectInputStream。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ObjectInputStream that reads from the specified InputStream. A serialization stream header is read from the stream and verified. This constructor will block until the corresponding ObjectOutputStream has written and flushed the header.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个ObjectInputStream,从指定的InputStream中读取。从流中读取一个序列化流头并进行验证。这个构造函数将阻塞,直到相应的ObjectOutputStream写入并刷新头。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ObjectOutputStream that writes to the specified OutputStream.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个ObjectOutputStream,写入指定的OutputStream。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ObjectOutputStream that writes to the specified OutputStream. This constructor writes the serialization stream header to the underlying stream; callers may wish to flush the stream immediately to ensure that constructors for receiving ObjectInputStreams will not block when reading the header.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个ObjectOutputStream,写入指定的OutputStream。这个构造函数将序列化流头写入底层流;调用者可能希望立即刷新流,以确保接收ObjectInputStreams的构造函数在读取流头时不会阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ObjectStreamField representing a serializable field with the given name and type.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个ObjectStreamField,用给定的名称和类型表示一个可序列化的字段。

trans-unit.source: Creates an ObjectStreamField representing a serializable field with the given name and type. If unshared is false, values of the represented field are serialized and deserialized in the default manner--if the field is non-primitive, object values are serialized and deserialized as if they had been written and read by calls to writeObject and readObject. If unshared is true, values of the represented field are serialized and deserialized as if they had been written and read by calls to writeUnshared and readUnshared.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个ObjectStreamField,用给定的名称和类型来表示一个可序列化的字段,如果unshared为false,则表示的字段的值会以默认的方式序列化和反序列化。如果unshared为false,则表示的字段的值将以默认的方式被序列化和反序列化--如果该字段是非原生字段,则对象的值将被序列化和反序列化,就像它们被调用writeObject和readObject写入和读取一样。如果unshared为真,则代表字段的值会被序列化和反序列化,就像通过调用writeUnshared和readUnshared来写和读一样。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Oid object from its ASN.1 DER encoding.
trans-unit.target: 从其ASN.1 DER编码创建一个Oid对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Oid object from its ASN.1 DER encoding. This refers to the full encoding including tag and length. The structure and encoding of Oids is defined in ISOIEC-8824 and ISOIEC-8825. This method is identical in functionality to its InputStream conterpart.
trans-unit.target: 从 ASN.1 DER 编码中创建一个 Oid 对象。这指的是包括标签和长度的完整编码。Oid的结构和编码在ISOIEC-8824和ISOIEC-8825中被定义。这个方法在功能上和它的输入流对应方法是一样的。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Oid object from its ASN.1 DER encoding. This refers to the full encoding including tag and length. The structure and encoding of Oids is defined in ISOIEC-8824 and ISOIEC-8825. This method is identical in functionality to its byte array counterpart.
trans-unit.target: 从 ASN.1 DER 编码中创建一个 Oid 对象。这指的是包括标签和长度的完整编码。Oid的结构和编码在ISOIEC-8824和ISOIEC-8825中定义。这个方法的功能和它的字节数组是一样的。

trans-unit.source: Creates an OutputStreamWriter that uses the default character encoding.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用默认字符编码的 OutputStreamWriter。

trans-unit.source: Creates an OutputStreamWriter that uses the given charset encoder.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用给定charset编码器的OutputStreamWriter。

trans-unit.source: Creates an OutputStreamWriter that uses the given charset.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用给定字符集的 OutputStreamWriter。

trans-unit.source: Creates an OutputStreamWriter that uses the named charset.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用命名的charset的OutputStreamWriter。

trans-unit.source: Creates an SSL socket using the supplied SSL socket factory and attaches it to the existing connection. Performs the TLS handshake and returns the negotiated session information.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的SSL套接字工厂创建一个SSL套接字,并将其连接到现有连接上。执行TLS握手并返回协商的会话信息。

trans-unit.source: Creates an SSL socket.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个SSL套接字。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个SSLContext对象。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个 X500PrivateCredential,将 X.509 证书、私钥和 KeyStore 别名关联起来。

trans-unit.source: Creates an annotation element to use for dynamically defined events.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个用于动态定义事件的注解元素。

trans-unit.source: Creates an appropriate call object for a new remote method invocation on this object. Passing operation array and index, allows the stubs generator to assign the operation indexes and interpret them. The remote reference may need the operation to encode in the call.
trans-unit.target: 为这个对象上的新远程方法调用创建一个合适的调用对象。传递操作数组和索引,允许存根生成器分配操作索引并解释它们。远程引用可能需要在调用中对操作进行编码。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array appropriate for the indicated data type.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个适合指定数据类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array, populates it with UI objects from the passed-in vector, and returns the array.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个数组,用传入的向量填充UI对象,然后返回数组。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array, populates it with UI objects from the passed-in vector, and returns the array. If uis is null, this method returns an array with zero elements. If uis is an empty vector, this method returns null. A run-time error occurs if any objects in the uis vector are not of type ComponentUI.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个数组，并使用传入的矢量中的UI对象填充该数组，然后返回该数组。如果 uis 为null，则此方法返回一个包含零个元素的数组。如果 uis 是一个空向量，则此方法返回 null 。如果 uis 向量中的任何对象都不是 ComponentUI 类型，则会发生运行时错误。

trans-unit.target: 用给定的线程池创建一个异步通道组,根据需要创建新的线程。

trans-unit.source: Creates an asynchronous channel group with a given thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的线程池创建一个异步通道组。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个椭圆曲线特征2有限域，该域具有2 ^ m 个元素（具有法向基础）。

trans-unit.source: Creates an elliptic curve characteristic 2 finite field which has 2^m elements with polynomial basis.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个椭圆曲线特征为2的有限域，该域具有2 ^ m 个基于多项式的元素。

trans-unit.source: Creates an elliptic curve characteristic 2 finite field which has 2^m elements with polynomial basis. The reduction polynomial for this field is based on ks whose content contains the order of the middle term(s) of the reduction polynomial. Note: A valid reduction polynomial is either a trinomial (X^m + X^k + 1 with m > k >= 1) or a pentanomial (X^m + X^k3 + X^k2 + X^k1 + 1 with m > k3 > k2 > k1 >= 1), so ks should have length 1 or 3.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有2 ^ m 个基于多项式的元素的椭圆曲线特征2有限域。该字段的归约多项式基于 ks ,其内容包含归约多项式中间项的阶数。注意：有效的归约多项式可以是三项式（X ^ m + X ^ k + 1， m > k > = 1）或五项式（X ^ m + X ^ k3 + X ^ k2 + X ^ k1 + 1 m > k3 > k2 > k1 > = 1），因此 ks 的长度应为1或3。

trans-unit.source: Creates an elliptic curve characteristic 2 finite field which has 2^m elements with polynomial basis. The reduction polynomial for this field is based on rp whose i-th bit corresponds to the i-th coefficient of the reduction polynomial.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有2 ^ m 个基于多项式的元素的椭圆曲线特征2有限域。用于该字段的归约多项式基于 rp ,其第i位对应于归约多项式的第i个系数。

trans-unit.source: Creates an elliptic curve prime finite field with the specified prime p.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有指定素数 p 的椭圆曲线素数有限域。

trans-unit.source: Creates an elliptic curve with the specified elliptic field field and the coefficients a and b.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有指定椭圆场 field 和系数 a 和 b 的椭圆曲线。

trans-unit.source: Creates an elliptic curve with the specified elliptic field field, the coefficients a and b, and the seed used for curve generation.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的椭圆场 field ，系数 a 和 b 以及用于曲线生成的 seed 创建一条椭圆曲线。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty (no viewport view) JScrollPane where both horizontal and vertical scrollbars appear when needed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的（ JScrollPane 口视图）JScrollPane，在需要时在其中同时显示水平和垂直滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty (no viewport view) JScrollPane with specified scrollbar policies.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的滚动条策略创建一个空的（ JScrollPane 口视图）JScrollPane。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty (no viewport view) JScrollPane with specified scrollbar policies. The available policy settings are listed at setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(int) and setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(int).
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的滚动条策略创建一个空的（ JScrollPane 口视图）JScrollPane。可用的策略设置在 setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(int) 和 setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(int) 处列出。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty Constraints object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的 Constraints 对象。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的 DefaultRowSorter 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty DocumentType node.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的 DocumentType 节点。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty DocumentType node. Entity declarations and notations are not made available. Entity reference expansions and default attribute additions do not occur..
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的 DocumentType 节点。实体声明和表示法不可用。不会发生实体引用扩展和默认属性添加。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的 Spliterator.OfLong

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty Spliterator
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的 Spliterator

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty TabbedPane with a default tab placement of JTabbedPane.TOP.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个默认选项卡位置为 JTabbedPane.TOP 的空 TabbedPane 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty TabbedPane with the specified tab placement and tab layout policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的选项卡放置和选项卡布局策略创建一个空的 TabbedPane 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty TabbedPane with the specified tab placement and tab layout policy. Tab placement may be either: JTabbedPane.TOP, JTabbedPane.BOTTOM, JTabbedPane.LEFT, or JTabbedPane.RIGHT. Tab layout policy may be either: JTabbedPane.WRAP_TAB_LAYOUT or JTabbedPane.SCROLL_TAB_LAYOUT.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的选项卡放置和选项卡布局策略创建一个空的 TabbedPane 。制表符的位置可以是： JTabbedPane.TOP ， JTabbedPane.BOTTOM ， JTabbedPane.LEFT 或 JTabbedPane.RIGHT 。选项卡布局策略可以是： JTabbedPane.WRAP_TAB_LAYOUT 或 JTabbedPane.SCROLL_TAB_LAYOUT 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty TabbedPane with the specified tab placement of either: JTabbedPane.TOP, JTabbedPane.BOTTOM, JTabbedPane.LEFT, or JTabbedPane.RIGHT.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个具有指定标签位置的空 TabbedPane ： JTabbedPane.TOP ， JTabbedPane.BOTTOM ， JTabbedPane.LEFT 或 JTabbedPane.RIGHT 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty TabularDataSupport instance whose open-type is tabularType, and whose underlying HashMap has a default initial capacity (101) and default load factor (0.75).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的 TabularDataSupport 实例，其打开类型为 tabularType ，并且其基础 HashMap 具有默认的初始容量（101）和默认的负载系数（0.75）。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty TabularDataSupport instance whose open-type is tabularType, and whose underlying HashMap has the specified initial capacity and load factor.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的 TabularDataSupport 实例，其打开类型为 tabularType ，并且其基础 HashMap 具有指定的初始容量和负载因子。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty TreePath.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的 TreePath 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty TreePath. This is provided for subclasses that represent paths in a different manner. Subclasses that use this constructor must override getLastPathComponent, and getParentPath.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的 TreePath 。这是为以不同方式表示路径的子类提供的。使用此构造方法的子类必须重写 getLastPathComponent 和 getParentPath 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty Stack.

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty border that takes up no space.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不占空间的空边框。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个不占空间的空边框。上、下、左、右四边的宽度均为零)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty border that takes up space but which does no drawing, specifying the width of the top, left, bottom, and right sides.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个占用空间但不绘图的空边框,指定顶部、左侧、底部和右侧的宽度。

trans-unit.target: 用指定的镶边创建一个空边框。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty defaults table with the specified initial capacity and load factor.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的初始容量和负载系数创建一个空的默认表。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty defaults table.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空的默认值表。

trans-unit.target: 在默认的临时文件目录下创建一个空文件,使用给定的前缀和后缀生成其名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty file in the default temporary-file directory, using the given prefix and suffix to generate its name. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking createTempFile(prefix, suffix, null).
trans-unit.target: 在默认的临时文件目录中创建一个空文件，使用给定的前缀和后缀生成其名称。调用此方法等效于调用 createTempFile(prefix, suffix, null) 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty file in the default temporary-file directory, using the given prefix and suffix to generate its name. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking createTempFile(prefix, suffix, null).
trans-unit.target: 在默认的临时文件目录中创建一个空文件，使用给定的前缀和后缀生成其名称。调用此方法等效于调用 createTempFile(prefix, suffix, null) 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty file in the default temporary-file directory, using the given prefix and suffix to generate its name. The resulting Path is associated with the default FileSystem.
trans-unit.target: 在默认的临时文件目录中创建一个空文件，使用给定的前缀和后缀生成其名称。结果 Path 与默认的 FileSystem 关联。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty file in the default temporary-file directory, using the given prefix and suffix to generate its name. The resulting Path is associated with the default FileSystem.
trans-unit.target: 在默认的临时文件目录中创建一个空文件，使用给定的前缀和后缀生成其名称。结果 Path 与默认的 FileSystem 关联。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty polygon.

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty property list with no default values, and with an initial size accommodating the specified number of elements without the need to dynamically resize.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个没有默认值的空属性列表,其初始大小可容纳指定数量的元素,无需动态调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty property list with no default values.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个没有默认值的空属性列表。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty property list with the specified defaults.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的默认值创建一个空属性列表。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty set.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空集。

trans-unit.source: Creates an entity.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个实体。

trans-unit.source: Creates an entry representing a PROXY connection.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个代表PROXY连接的条目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an entry representing a PROXY connection. Certain combinations are illegal. For instance, for types Http, and Socks, a SocketAddress must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个代表PROXY连接的条目。某些组合是非法的。例如，对于Http和Socks类型，必须提供SocketAddress 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an entry representing a mapping from the specified key to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个条目,代表从指定键到指定值的映射。

trans-unit.source: Creates an entry representing the same mapping as the specified entry.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个与指定条目相同的映射的条目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum map initialized from the specified map.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的映射中创建一个初始化的枚举映射。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum map initialized from the specified map. If the specified map is an EnumMap instance, this constructor behaves identically to EnumMap(EnumMap). Otherwise, the specified map must contain at least one mapping (in order to determine the new enum map's key type).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个从指定映射初始化的枚举映射。如果指定的映射是 EnumMap 实例，则此构造方法的行为与 EnumMap(EnumMap) 相同。否则，指定的映射必须至少包含一个映射（以确定新枚举映射的键类型）。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum map initialized from the specified map. If the specified map is an EnumMap instance, this constructor behaves identically to EnumMap(EnumMap). Otherwise, the specified map must contain at least one mapping (in order to determine the new enum map's key type).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个从指定映射初始化的枚举映射。如果指定的映射是 EnumMap 实例，则此构造方法的行为与 EnumMap(EnumMap) 相同。否则，指定的映射必须至少包含一个映射（以确定新枚举映射的键类型）。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum map with the same key type as the specified enum map, initially containing the same mappings (if any).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个与指定的枚举映射具有相同键类型的枚举映射,初始包含相同的映射(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set containing all of the elements in the specified element type.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含指定元素类型中所有元素的枚举集。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set initialized from the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个从指定集合初始化的枚举集。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set initialized from the specified collection. If the specified collection is an EnumSet instance, this static factory method behaves identically to copyOf(EnumSet). Otherwise, the specified collection must contain at least one element (in order to determine the new enum set's element type).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个从指定集合初始化的枚举集。如果指定的集合是 EnumSet 实例，则此静态工厂方法的行为与 copyOf(EnumSet) 相同。否则，指定的集合必须至少包含一个元素（以确定新枚举集的元素类型）。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set initialized from the specified collection. If the specified collection is an EnumSet instance, this static factory method behaves identically to copyOf(EnumSet). Otherwise, the specified collection must contain at least one element (in order to determine the new enum set's element type).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个从指定集合初始化的枚举集。如果指定的集合是 EnumSet 实例，则此静态工厂方法的行为与 copyOf(EnumSet) 相同。否则，指定的集合必须至少包含一个元素（以确定新枚举集的元素类型）。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set initially containing all of the elements in the range defined by the two specified endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个枚举集,初始包含两个指定端点定义的范围内的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set initially containing all of the elements in the range defined by the two specified endpoints. The returned set will contain the endpoints themselves, which may be identical but must not be out of order.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个枚举集,初始包含两个指定端点所定义范围内的所有元素。返回的集合将包含端点本身,它们可能是相同的,但不能不按顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set initially containing the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含指定元素的枚举集。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set initially containing the specified element. Overloadings of this method exist to initialize an enum set with one through five elements. A sixth overloading is provided that uses the varargs feature. This overloading may be used to create an enum set initially containing an arbitrary number of elements, but is likely to run slower than the overloadings that do not use varargs.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含指定元素的枚举集。本方法的重载可以初始化一个包含1到5个元素的枚举集。第六种重载是使用varargs特性。这个重载可以用来创建一个初始包含任意数量元素的枚举集,但是运行速度可能比不使用varargs的重载要慢。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set initially containing the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含指定元素的枚举集。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set initially containing the specified elements. Overloadings of this method exist to initialize an enum set with one through five elements. A sixth overloading is provided that uses the varargs feature. This overloading may be used to create an enum set initially containing an arbitrary number of elements, but is likely to run slower than the overloadings that do not use varargs.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含指定元素的枚举集。本方法的重载可以初始化一个包含1到5个元素的枚举集。第六种重载是使用varargs特性。这个重载可以用来创建一个初始包含任意数量元素的枚举集,但是运行速度可能比不使用varargs的重载要慢。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set initially containing the specified elements. This factory, whose parameter list uses the varargs feature, may be used to create an enum set initially containing an arbitrary number of elements, but it is likely to run slower than the overloadings that do not use varargs.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个最初包含指定元素的枚举集。这个工厂的参数列表使用了varargs特性,可以用来创建一个最初包含任意数量元素的枚举集,但它的运行速度可能比不使用varargs的重载慢。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set with the same element type as the specified enum set, initially containing all the elements of this type that are
trans-unit.target: 创建一个与指定的枚举集具有相同元素类型的枚举集,初始包含该类型的所有元素,这些元素都属于

trans-unit.source: Creates an enum set with the same element type as the specified enum set, initially containing the same elements (if any).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个元素类型与指定的枚举集相同的枚举集,初始包含相同的元素(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an etched border with the specified etch-type whose colors will be derived from the background color of the component passed into the paintBorder method.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的蚀刻类型创建一个蚀刻边框,其颜色将从传入paintBorder方法的组件的背景色中导出。

trans-unit.source: Creates an etched border with the specified etch-type, highlight and shadow colors.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的蚀刻类型、高光和阴影颜色创建一个蚀刻边框。

trans-unit.source: Creates an event multicaster instance which chains listener-a with listener-b.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个事件多播器实例,将监听器-a与监听器-b连锁起来。

trans-unit.source: Creates an event multicaster instance which chains listener-a with listener-b. Input parameters a and b should not be null, though implementations may vary in choosing whether or not to throw NullPointerException in that case.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个事件多播器实例，该实例将侦听器-a与侦听器-b链接在一起。输入参数 a 和 b 不应为 null ，尽管在这种情况下选择是否引发 NullPointerException 的实现可能会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Creates an event stream for the current JVM (Java Virtual Machine).
trans-unit.target: 为当前JVM(Java虚拟机)创建一个事件流。

trans-unit.source: Creates an event stream from a disk repository.
trans-unit.target: 从磁盘存储库中创建一个事件流。

trans-unit.source: Creates an event stream from a file.
trans-unit.target: 从文件中创建一个事件流。

trans-unit.source: Creates an extended response object that corresponds to the LDAP StartTLS extended request.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对应于LDAP StartTLS扩展请求的扩展响应对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates an icon for an internal frame.
trans-unit.target: 为内部框架创建一个图标。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image containing pixels read from the screen.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含从屏幕上读取的像素的图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image containing pixels read from the screen. This image does not include the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含从屏幕上读取的像素的图像。该图像不包括鼠标指针。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image containing pixels read from the screen. This image does not include the mouse cursor. This method can be used in case there is a scaling transform from user space to screen (device) space. Typically this means that the display is a high resolution screen, although strictly it means any case in which there is such a transform. Returns a MultiResolutionImage.
trans-unit.target: 创建包含从屏幕读取的像素的图像。该图像不包括鼠标光标。如果存在从用户空间到屏幕（设备）空间的缩放转换，则可以使用此方法。通常，这意味着显示器是高分辨率屏幕，尽管严格地讲，这意味着存在这种变换的任何情况。返回一个 MultiResolutionImage 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from the specified image producer.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的图像制作者中创建一个图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image which decodes the image stored in the specified byte array, and at the specified offset and length.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个图像,该图像以指定的偏移量和长度对存储在指定字节数组中的图像进行解码。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image which decodes the image stored in the specified byte array, and at the specified offset and length. The data must be in some image format, such as GIF or JPEG, that is supported by this toolkit.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个图像,以指定的偏移量和长度对存储在指定字节数组中的图像进行解码。数据必须是该工具包支持的某种图像格式,如GIF或JPEG。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image which decodes the image stored in the specified byte array.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个图像,对存储在指定字节数组中的图像进行解码。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image with the specified image producer.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的图像制作者创建一个图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates an implementation of listenerInterface in which all of the methods in the listener interface apply the handler's action to the target.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 listenerInterface 的实现，在该实现中，listener接口中的所有方法都将处理程序的 action 应用于 target 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an implementation of listenerInterface in which all of the methods in the listener interface apply the handler's action to the target. This method is implemented by calling the other, more general, implementation of the create method with both the eventPropertyName and the listenerMethodName taking the value null. Refer to the general version of create for a complete description of the action parameter.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 listenerInterface 的实现，在该实现中，listener接口中的所有方法都将处理程序的 action 应用于 target 。该方法是通过调用 create 方法的另一个更通用的实现来实现的，其中 eventPropertyName 和 listenerMethodName 都采用 null 值。有关 action 参数的完整说明，请参考 the general version of create 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an implementation of listenerInterface in which all of the methods in the listener interface apply the handler's action to the target. This method is implemented by calling the other, more general, implementation of the create method with both the eventPropertyName and the listenerMethodName taking the value null. Refer to the general version of create for a complete description of the action parameter.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 listenerInterface 的实现，在该实现中，listener接口中的所有方法都将处理程序的 action 应用于 target 。该方法是通过调用 create 方法的另一个更通用的实现来实现的，其中 eventPropertyName 和 listenerMethodName 都采用 null 值。有关 action 参数的完整说明，请参考 the general version of create 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an implementation of listenerInterface in which the method named listenerMethodName passes the value of the event expression, eventPropertyName, to the final method in the statement, action, which is applied to the target.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 listenerInterface 的实现，其中名为 listenerMethodName 的方法将事件表达式 eventPropertyName 的值传递给语句 action 中的最终方法，该方法应用于 target 。

trans-unit.source: Creates an implementation of listenerInterface in which the method named listenerMethodName passes the value of the event expression, eventPropertyName, to the final method in the statement, action, which is applied to the target. All of the other listener methods do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 listenerInterface 的实现，其中名为 listenerMethodName 的方法将事件表达式 eventPropertyName 的值传递给语句 action 中的最终方法，该方法应用于 target 。所有其他侦听器方法均不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Creates an increase button.

trans-unit.source: Creates an invisible "glue" component that can be useful in a Box whose visible components have a maximum width (for a horizontal box) or height (for a vertical box).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不可见的 "胶水 "组件,它可以在方框中发挥作用,因为方框中的可见组件有最大的宽度(对于水平方框)或高度(对于垂直方框)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an invisible "glue" component that can be useful in a Box whose visible components have a maximum width (for a horizontal box) or height (for a vertical box). You can think of the glue component as being a gooey substance that expands as much as necessary to fill the space between its neighboring components.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不可见的 "胶水 "组件,它可以在一个可见组件有最大宽度(对于水平盒子)或高度(对于垂直盒子)的盒子中发挥作用。你可以把胶水组件想象成一种粘稠的物质,只要有必要就会膨胀,以填充其相邻组件之间的空间。

trans-unit.source: Creates an invisible component that's always the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个总是指定大小的隐形组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates an invisible, fixed-height component.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不可见的、固定高度的组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates an invisible, fixed-height component. In a vertical box, you typically use this method to force a certain amount of space between two components. In a horizontal box, you might use this method to force the box to be at least the specified height. The invisible component has no width unless excess space is available, in which case it takes its share of available space, just like any other component that has no maximum width.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不可见的、固定高度的组件。在垂直的方框中,你通常使用此方法来强制两个组件之间有一定的空间。在水平框中,您可以使用此方法强制框体至少达到指定高度。不可见组件没有宽度,除非有多余的空间,在这种情况下,它占用了它的可用空间,就像任何其他没有最大宽度的组件一样。

trans-unit.source: Creates an invisible, fixed-width component.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不可见的、固定宽度的组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates an invisible, fixed-width component. In a horizontal box, you typically use this method to force a certain amount of space between two components. In a vertical box, you might use this method to force the box to be at least the specified width. The invisible component has no height unless excess space is available, in which case it takes its share of available space, just like any other component that has no maximum height.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不可见的、固定宽度的组件。在水平框中,你通常使用此方法来强制两个组件之间有一定的空间。在垂直的方框中,您可以使用这种方法来强制方框至少达到指定的宽度。不可见的组件没有高度,除非有多余的空间,在这种情况下,它占用了它的可用空间,就像其他没有最大高度的组件一样。

trans-unit.source: Creates an iterator that iterates over the charsets supported by this provider. This method is used in the implementation of the Charset.availableCharsets method.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个迭代器，迭代该提供程序支持的字符集。在 Charset.availableCharsets 方法的实现中使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an object that encapsulates the current execution environment.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个封装当前执行环境的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates an object that encapsulates the current execution environment. The result of this method is used, for example, by the three-argument checkConnect method and by the two-argument checkRead method. These methods are needed because a trusted method may be called on to read a file or open a socket on behalf of another method. The trusted method needs to determine if the other (possibly untrusted) method would be allowed to perform the operation on its own.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个封装当前执行环境的对象。例如，三参数 checkConnect 方法和两参数 checkRead 方法使用此方法的结果。之所以需要这些方法，是因为可以调用受信任的方法来读取文件或代表另一个方法打开套接字。受信任的方法需要确定是否允许其他（可能不受信任的）方法自行执行操作。

trans-unit.target: 使用位置或引用信息以及指定的属性创建对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates an opaque sRGB color with the specified combined RGB value consisting of the red component in bits 16-23, the green component in bits 8-15, and the blue component in bits 0-7.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不透明的sRGB颜色,其指定的组合RGB值包括位16-23的红色分量,位8-15的绿色分量和位0-7的蓝色分量。

trans-unit.source: Creates an opaque sRGB color with the specified combined RGB value consisting of the red component in bits 16-23, the green component in bits 8-15, and the blue component in bits 0-7. The actual color used in rendering depends on finding the best match given the color space available for a particular output device. Alpha is defaulted to 255.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不透明的 sRGB 颜色,其指定的组合 RGB 值包括位 16-23 的红色分量、位 8-15 的绿色分量和位 0-7 的蓝色分量。渲染中使用的实际颜色取决于在特定输出设备可用的色彩空间中找到最佳匹配。Alpha 默认为 255。

trans-unit.source: Creates an opaque sRGB color with the specified red, green, and blue values in the range (0 - 255).
trans-unit.target: 在(0-255)的范围内用指定的红、绿、蓝值创建不透明的sRGB颜色。

trans-unit.source: Creates an opaque sRGB color with the specified red, green, and blue values in the range (0 - 255). The actual color used in rendering depends on finding the best match given the color space available for a given output device. Alpha is defaulted to 255.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不透明的sRGB颜色,其范围为(0-255)中指定的红、绿、蓝值。渲染中使用的实际颜色取决于为给定输出设备提供的色彩空间找到最佳匹配。Alpha默认为255。

trans-unit.source: Creates an opaque sRGB color with the specified red, green, and blue values in the range (0.0 - 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 以指定的红、绿、蓝三色为范围(0.0-1.0)创建不透明的sRGB颜色。

trans-unit.source: Creates an opaque sRGB color with the specified red, green, and blue values in the range (0.0 - 1.0). Alpha is defaulted to 1.0. The actual color used in rendering depends on finding the best match given the color space available for a particular output device.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的红、绿、蓝三色为范围(0.0-1.0)创建不透明的sRGB颜色。Alpha默认为1.0。渲染中使用的实际颜色取决于为特定输出设备的可用色彩空间找到最佳匹配。

trans-unit.source: Creates an output stream filter built on top of the specified underlying output stream.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的底层输出流上创建一个输出流过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Creates an output stream with the specified Checksum.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的Checksum创建一个输出流。

trans-unit.source: Creates an sRGB color with the specified combined RGBA value consisting of the alpha component in bits 24-31, the red component in bits 16-23, the green component in bits 8-15, and the blue component in bits 0-7.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的组合RGBA值创建sRGB颜色,包括24-31位的alpha分量、16-23位的红色分量、8-15位的绿色分量和0-7位的蓝色分量。

trans-unit.source: Creates an sRGB color with the specified combined RGBA value consisting of the alpha component in bits 24-31, the red component in bits 16-23, the green component in bits 8-15, and the blue component in bits 0-7. If the hasalpha argument is false, alpha is defaulted to 255.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有指定组合RGBA值的sRGB颜色，该值由位24-31中的alpha分量，位16-23中的红色分量，位8-15中的绿色分量和位0-7中的蓝色分量组成。如果 hasalpha 参数为 false ，则默认将alpha设置为255。

trans-unit.source: Creates an sRGB color with the specified red, green, blue, and alpha values in the range (0 - 255).
trans-unit.target: 用指定的红、绿、蓝和alpha值在(0-255)范围内创建sRGB颜色。

trans-unit.source: Creates an sRGB color with the specified red, green, blue, and alpha values in the range (0.0 - 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 在(0.0-1.0)范围内用指定的红、绿、蓝和alpha值创建一个sRGB颜色。

trans-unit.source: Creates an sRGB color with the specified red, green, blue, and alpha values in the range (0.0 - 1.0). The actual color used in rendering depends on finding the best match given the color space available for a particular output device.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的红、绿、蓝和阿尔法值在 (0.0-1.0)范围内创建 sRGB 颜色。渲染中使用的实际颜色取决于为特定输出设备的可用色彩空间找到最佳匹配。

trans-unit.source: Creates and binds a new context, along with associated attributes.
trans-unit.target: 创建并绑定一个新的上下文,以及相关的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates and binds a new context, along with associated attributes. See createSubcontext(Name, Attributes) for details.
trans-unit.target: 创建并绑定新的上下文以及关联的属性。有关详细信息 createSubcontext(Name, Attributes) 请参见createSubcontext（Name，Attributes）。

trans-unit.source: Creates and binds a new context, along with associated attributes. See DirContext.createSubcontext(Name, Attributes) for details.
trans-unit.target: 创建并绑定新的上下文以及关联的属性。有关详细信息 DirContext.createSubcontext(Name, Attributes) 请参见DirContext.createSubcontext（Name，Attributes）。

trans-unit.source: Creates and binds a new context, along with associated attributes. See createSubcontext(Name, Attributes) for details.
trans-unit.target: 创建并绑定新的上下文以及关联的属性。有关详细信息 createSubcontext(Name, Attributes) 请参见createSubcontext（Name，Attributes）。

trans-unit.source: Creates and binds a new context, along with associated attributes. This method creates a new subcontext with the given name, binds it in the target context (that named by all but terminal atomic component of the name), and associates the supplied attributes with the newly created object. All intermediate and target contexts must already exist. If attrs is null, this method is equivalent to Context.createSubcontext().
trans-unit.target: 创建并绑定新的上下文以及关联的属性。此方法使用给定名称创建一个新的子上下文，将其绑定到目标上下文（该名称由除该名称的末尾原子以外的所有元素命名），并将提供的属性与新创建的对象相关联。所有中间和目标上下文必须已经存在。如果 attrs 为null，则此方法等效于 Context.createSubcontext() 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and binds a new context.
trans-unit.target: 创建并绑定一个新的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Creates and binds a new context. Creates a new context with the given name and binds it in the target context (that named by all but terminal atomic component of the name). All intermediate contexts and the target context must already exist.
trans-unit.target: 创建并绑定一个新的上下文。用给定的名称创建一个新的上下文,并将其绑定到目标上下文中(除名称的终端原子成分外,其他名称都被命名)。所有中间上下文和目标上下文必须已经存在。

trans-unit.source: Creates and binds a new context. See createSubcontext(Name) for details.
trans-unit.target: 创建并绑定新的上下文。有关详细信息，请参见 createSubcontext(Name) 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and binds a new context. See Context.createSubcontext(Name) for details.
trans-unit.target: 创建并绑定新的上下文。有关详细信息，请参见 Context.createSubcontext(Name) 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and binds a new context. See createSubcontext(Name) for details.
trans-unit.target: 创建并绑定新的上下文。有关详细信息，请参见 createSubcontext(Name) 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and executes a ScheduledFuture that becomes enabled after the given delay.
trans-unit.target: 创建并执行一个ScheduledFuture,并在给定的延迟之后启用。

trans-unit.source: Creates and executes a one-shot action that becomes enabled after the given delay.
trans-unit.target: 创建并执行一个单次动作,在给定的延迟后启用。

trans-unit.source: Creates and executes a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given delay between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next. If any execution of the task encounters an exception, subsequent executions are suppressed. Otherwise, the task will only terminate via cancellation or termination of the executor.
trans-unit.target: 创建并执行一个周期性动作,该动作在给定的初始延迟后首先启用,随后在一次执行结束和下一次执行开始之间的给定延迟后启用。如果任务的任何执行遇到异常,后续的执行将被抑制。否则,任务只能通过取消或终止执行者来终止。

trans-unit.source: Creates and executes a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given period; that is executions will commence after initialDelay then initialDelay+period, then initialDelay + 2 * period, and so on. If any execution of the task encounters an exception, subsequent executions are suppressed. Otherwise, the task will only terminate via cancellation or termination of the executor. If any execution of this task takes longer than its period, then subsequent executions may start late, but will not concurrently execute.
trans-unit.target: 创建并执行一个周期性操作，该操作将在给定的初始延迟后首先启用，然后在给定的时间段内启用；即后执行将开始 initialDelay 然后 initialDelay+period ，然后 initialDelay + 2 * period ，依此类推。如果该任务的任何执行遇到异常，则将禁止后续执行。否则，任务将仅通过取消或终止执行程序而终止。如果此任务的任何执行花费的时间超过其时间，则后续执行可能会开始较晚，但不会同时执行。

trans-unit.source: Creates and exports a Registry instance on the local host that accepts requests on the specified port.
trans-unit.target: 在本地主机上创建并导出 Registry 实例，该实例在指定 port 上接受请求。

trans-unit.source: Creates and exports a Registry instance on the local host that uses custom socket factories for communication with that instance.
trans-unit.target: 在本地主机上创建并导出 Registry 实例，该实例使用自定义套接字工厂与该实例进行通信。

trans-unit.source: Creates and exports a Registry instance on the local host that uses custom socket factories for communication with that instance. The registry that is created listens for incoming requests on the given port using a ServerSocket created from the supplied RMIServerSocketFactory.
trans-unit.target: 在本地主机上创建并导出 Registry 实例，该实例使用自定义套接字工厂与该实例进行通信。创建的注册表使用从提供的 RMIServerSocketFactory 创建的 ServerSocket 侦听给定 port 上的传入请求。

trans-unit.source: Creates and exports a new UnicastRemoteObject object using an anonymous port.
trans-unit.target: 使用匿名端口创建并导出一个新的 UnicastRemoteObject 对象。

trans-unit.target: 使用提供的特定端口和套接字工厂创建和导出一个新的UnicastRemoteObject对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and exports a new UnicastRemoteObject object using the particular supplied port.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的特定端口创建和导出一个新的UnicastRemoteObject对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes a new Insets object with the specified top, left, bottom, and right insets.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的顶部，左侧，底部和右侧插图创建和初始化新的 Insets 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes an instance of TableColumn with the specified model index, width, cell renderer, and cell editor; all TableColumn constructors delegate to this one.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的模型索引，宽度，单元格渲染器和单元格编辑器创建并初始化 TableColumn 的实例；所有 TableColumn 构造函数都委托给此对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes an instance of TableColumn with the specified model index, width, cell renderer, and cell editor; all TableColumn constructors delegate to this one. The value of width is used for both the initial and preferred width; if width is negative, they're set to 0. The minimum width is set to 15 unless the initial width is less, in which case the minimum width is set to the initial width.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的模型索引，宽度，单元格渲染器和单元格编辑器创建并初始化 TableColumn 的实例；所有 TableColumn 构造函数都委托给此对象。 width 的值用于初始宽度和首选宽度。如果 width 为负，则将它们设置为0。除非初始宽度较小，否则最小宽度将设置为15，在这种情况下，最小宽度将设置为初始宽度。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes the components which make up the aggregate combo box.
trans-unit.target: 创建并初始化组成集合组合框的组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes the components which make up the aggregate combo box. This method is called as part of the UI installation process.
trans-unit.target: 创建并初始化组成集合组合框的组件。该方法作为UI安装过程的一部分被调用。

trans-unit.source: Creates and installs any required subcomponents for the JTabbedPane.
trans-unit.target: 创建并安装JTabbedPane所需的任何子组件。

trans-unit.target: 创建并安装JTabbedPane所需的任何子组件。由 installUI 调用。

trans-unit.source: Creates and installs listeners for the combo box and its model.
trans-unit.target: 为组合箱及其模型创建和安装监听器。

trans-unit.target: 为组合框及其模型创建和安装监听器。本方法在安装UI时被调用。

trans-unit.source: Creates and installs the listeners for the JList, its model, and its selectionModel.
trans-unit.target: 为JList、它的模型和它的selectionModel创建和安装监听器。

trans-unit.source: Creates and installs the listeners for the JList, its model, and its selectionModel. This method is called at installUI() time.
trans-unit.target: 为JList、它的模型和它的选择模型创建并安装监听器。这个方法在 installUI()时被调用。

trans-unit.source: Creates and links a class or interface from bytes with the same class loader and in the same runtime package and protection domain as this lookup's lookup class as if calling ClassLoader::defineClass.
trans-unit.target: 使用与该查找的查找类相同的类加载器并在相同的运行时包和保护域中，从 bytes 创建并链接一个类或接口，就像调用 ClassLoader::defineClass 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and return an instance of JButton that can be used to collapse the left component in the split pane.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 JButton 实例，该实例可用于折叠拆分窗格中的左侧组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PaintContext used to generate a circular radial color gradient pattern.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回用于生成圆形径向颜色渐变图案的 PaintContext 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PaintContext used to generate a circular radial color gradient pattern. See the description of the createContext method for information on null parameter handling.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回用于生成圆形径向颜色渐变图案的 PaintContext 。有关空参数处理的信息，请参见 createContext 方法的描述。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PaintContext used to generate a linear color gradient pattern.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回用于生成线性颜色渐变图案的 PaintContext 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PaintContext used to generate a linear color gradient pattern. See the specification of the method in the Paint interface for information on null parameter handling.

trans-unit.target: 创建并返回用于生成纯色字段图案的 PaintContext 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PaintContext used to generate a solid color field pattern. See the specification of the method in the Paint interface for information on null parameter handling.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回用于生成纯色字段图案的 PaintContext 。有关空参数处理的信息，请参见 Paint 界面中方法的 specification 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PaintContext used to generate a tiled image pattern.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回用于生成平铺图像图案的 PaintContext 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PaintContext used to generate a tiled image pattern. See the specification of the method in the Paint interface for information on null parameter handling.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回用于生成平铺图像图案的 PaintContext 。有关空参数处理的信息，请参见 Paint 界面中方法的 specification 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PaintContext used to generate the color pattern.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回用于生成颜色图案的 PaintContext 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PaintContext used to generate the color pattern. The arguments to this method convey additional information about the rendering operation that may be used or ignored on various implementations of the Paint interface. A caller must pass non-null values for all of the arguments except for the ColorModel argument which may be null to indicate that no specific ColorModel type is preferred. Implementations of the Paint interface are allowed to use or ignore any of the arguments as makes sense for their function, and are not constrained to use the specified ColorModel for the returned PaintContext, even if it is not null. Implementations are allowed to throw NullPointerException for any null argument other than the ColorModel argument, but are not required to do so.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回用于生成颜色图案的 PaintContext 。此方法的参数传达有关在 Paint 接口的各种实现中可以使用或忽略的渲染操作的附加信息。调用者必须为所有参数传递非 null 值，但 ColorModel 参数除外（该参数可以为 null 表示没有特定的 ColorModel 类型是首选）。 Paint 接口的实现被允许使用或忽略对其功能有意义的任何参数，并且不被约束为返回的 PaintContext 使用指定的 ColorModel 。，即使它不为 null 。允许实现为 ColorModel 参数以外的任何 null 参数抛出 NullPointerException ，但并非必须这样做。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Connection object that is a handle for the physical connection that this PooledConnection object represents.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 Connection 对象，该对象是此 PooledConnection 对象表示的物理连接的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Connection object that is a handle for the physical connection that this PooledConnection object represents. The connection pool manager calls this method when an application has called the method DataSource.getConnection and there are no PooledConnection objects available. See the interface description for more information.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 Connection 对象，该对象是此 PooledConnection 对象表示的物理连接的句柄。当应用程序已调用方法 DataSource.getConnection 且没有可用的 PooledConnection 对象时，连接池管理器将调用此方法。有关更多信息，请参见 interface description 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Container containing the buttons.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个包含按钮的 Container 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Container containing the buttons. The buttons are created by calling getButtons.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个包含按钮的 Container 。通过调用 getButtons 创建按钮。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a ParallelGroup that aligns it's elements along the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 ParallelGroup ，将其元素沿基线对齐。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a ParallelGroup that aligns its elements along the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 ParallelGroup ，将其元素沿基线对齐。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a ParallelGroup with an alignment of Alignment.LEADING.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个具有 Alignment.LEADING 对齐方式的 ParallelGroup 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a ParallelGroup with an alignment of Alignment.LEADING. This is a cover method for the more general createParallelGroup(Alignment) method.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个具有 Alignment.LEADING 对齐方式的 ParallelGroup 。这是更通用的 createParallelGroup(Alignment) 方法的Cover方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a ParallelGroup with the specified alignment and resize behavior.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回具有指定对齐和调整大小行为的 ParallelGroup 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a ParallelGroup with the specified alignment and resize behavior. The alignment argument specifies how children elements are positioned that do not fill the group. For example, if a ParallelGroup with an alignment of TRAILING is given 100 and a child only needs 50, the child is positioned at the position 50 (with a component orientation of left-to-right).
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回具有指定对齐和调整大小行为的 ParallelGroup 。该 alignment 参数指定如何子元素定位不填充该组。例如，如果给定一个具有 TRAILING 对齐方式的 ParallelGroup ，而一个孩子仅需要50，则该孩子将定位在位置50（组件的方向为从左到右）。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a ParallelGroup with the specified alignment.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回具有指定对齐方式的 ParallelGroup 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a ParallelGroup with the specified alignment. This is a cover method for the more general createParallelGroup(Alignment,boolean) method with true supplied for the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回具有指定对齐方式的 ParallelGroup 。这是更通用的 createParallelGroup(Alignment,boolean) 方法的掩盖方法，为第二个参数提供 true 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PrintJob capable of handling data from any of the supported document flavors.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 PrintJob ，该PrintJob能够处理任何受支持的文档样式中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PrinterJob which is initially associated with the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个最初与默认打印机关联的 PrinterJob 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PrinterJob which is initially associated with the default printer. If no printers are available on the system, a PrinterJob will still be returned from this method, but getPrintService() will return null, and calling print with this PrinterJob might generate an exception. Applications that need to determine if there are suitable printers before creating a PrinterJob should ensure that the array returned from lookupPrintServices is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个最初与默认打印机关联的 PrinterJob 。如果系统上没有可用的打印机，此方法仍将返回PrinterJob，但是 getPrintService() 将返回 null ，并且使用此 PrinterJob 调用 print 可能会生成异常。在创建 PrinterJob 之前需要确定是否有合适打印机的应用程序应确保从 lookupPrintServices 返回的数组不为空。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PropertyChangeListener that is responsible for listening for changes from the specified Action and updating the appropriate properties.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 PropertyChangeListener ，该监听器负责侦听来自指定 Action 的更改并更新适当的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a SequentialGroup.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 SequentialGroup 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a UIDefault.LazyValue that loads an image.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 UIDefault.LazyValue 来加载图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a UIDefault.LazyValue that loads an image. The returned value is an implementation of UIDefaults.LazyValue. When createValue is invoked on the returned object, the image is loaded. If the image is non-null, it is then wrapped in an Icon that implements UIResource. The image is loaded using Class.getResourceAsStream(gifFile).
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 UIDefault.LazyValue 来加载图像。返回的值是 UIDefaults.LazyValue 的实现。在返回的对象上调用 createValue 时，将加载图像。如果图像 non-null ，则将其包装在实现 UIResource 的 Icon 中。使用 Class.getResourceAsStream(gifFile) 加载图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a JButton that will provide the user with a way to scroll the tabs in a particular direction.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个JButton,为用户提供在特定方向上滚动标签的方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a JButton that will provide the user with a way to scroll the tabs in a particular direction. The returned JButton must be instance of UIResource.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个JButton,为用户提供在特定方向滚动标签的方法。返回的JButton必须是UIResource的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a PrintJob capable of handling data from any of the supported document flavors.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个能够处理来自任何支持的文档格式的数据的PrintJob。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a character Entity.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个字符 Entity 。

trans-unit.target: 创建并返回此 JobAttributes 的副本。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a copy of this PageAttributes.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回该PageAttributes的副本。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a copy of this object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回此对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a copy of this object. The precise meaning of "copy" may depend on the class of the object. The general intent is that, for any object x, the expression:
