trans-unit.target: 创建并返回这个节点的子节点的前序枚举。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a forward-order enumeration of this node's children. Modifying this node's child array invalidates any child enumerations created before the modification.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回此节点子代的前序枚举。修改此节点的子数组会使修改前创建的任何子枚举无效。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new JDialog wrapping this centered on the parent in the parent's frame.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新 JDialog 包裹 this 集中在 parent 的 parent 的帧。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new JDialog wrapping this centered on the parent in the parent's frame. This method can be overriden to further manipulate the dialog, to disable resizing, set the location, etc. Example:
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新 JDialog 包裹 this 集中在 parent 的 parent 的帧。可以重写此方法以进一步操作对话框，禁用调整大小，设置位置等。示例：

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new JDialog wrapping this centered on the parentComponent in the parentComponent's frame.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新 JDialog 包裹 this 居中于 parentComponent 在 parentComponent 的帧。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new JDialog wrapping this centered on the parentComponent in the parentComponent's frame. title is the title of the returned dialog. The returned JDialog will not be resizable by the user, however programs can invoke setResizable on the JDialog instance to change this property. The returned JDialog will be set up such that once it is closed, or the user clicks on one of the buttons, the optionpane's value property will be set accordingly and the dialog will be closed. Each time the dialog is made visible, it will reset the option pane's value property to JOptionPane.UNINITIALIZED_VALUE to ensure the user's subsequent action closes the dialog properly.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新 JDialog 包裹 this 居中于 parentComponent 在 parentComponent 的帧。 title 是返回对话框的标题。返回的 JDialog 不会由用户调整大小，但是程序可以在 JDialog 实例上调用 setResizable 来更改此属性。返回的 JDialog 将被设置为关闭后或用户单击其中一个按钮时，将相应地设置optionpane的value属性，并关闭对话框。每次使对话框可见时，它将选择窗格的value属性重置为 JOptionPane.UNINITIALIZED_VALUE 以确保用户的后续操作正确关闭对话框。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new ComponentHandler.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的ComponentHandler。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new ComponentHandler. This is used for the large model to mark the validCachedPreferredSize as invalid when the component moves.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的ComponentHandler。这用于大型模型在组件移动时将validCachedPreferredSize标记为无效。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new ModelMBeanAttributeInfo which is a duplicate of this ModelMBeanAttributeInfo.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的ModelMBeanAttributeInfo,它是这个ModelMBeanAttributeInfo的副本。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new ModelMBeanConstructorInfo which is a duplicate of this ModelMBeanConstructorInfo.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的ModelMBeanConstructorInfo,它是这个ModelMBeanConstructorInfo的副本。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new ModelMBeanNotificationInfo which is a duplicate of this ModelMBeanNotificationInfo.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的ModelMBeanNotificationInfo,它是这个ModelMBeanNotificationInfo的副本。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new ModelMBeanOperationInfo which is a duplicate of this ModelMBeanOperationInfo.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的ModelMBeanOperationInfo,它是这个ModelMBeanOperationInfo的副本。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new content model.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的内容模型。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new dialog containing the specified ColorChooser pane along with "OK", "Cancel", and "Reset" buttons.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新对话框，其中包含指定的 ColorChooser 窗格以及“确定”，“取消”和“重置”按钮。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new dialog containing the specified ColorChooser pane along with "OK", "Cancel", and "Reset" buttons. If the "OK" or "Cancel" buttons are pressed, the dialog is automatically hidden (but not disposed). If the "Reset" button is pressed, the color-chooser's color will be reset to the color which was set the last time show was invoked on the dialog and the dialog will remain showing.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新对话框，其中包含指定的 ColorChooser 窗格以及“确定”，“取消”和“重置”按钮。如果按下“确定”或“取消”按钮，该对话框将自动隐藏（但不会清除）。如果按下“重置”按钮，则颜色选择器的颜色将重置为上一次在对话框上调用 show 时所设置的颜色，并且该对话框将保持显示状态。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new parentless JDialog with the specified title.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回带有指定标题的新的无父母 JDialog 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new parentless JDialog with the specified title. The returned JDialog will not be resizable by the user, however programs can invoke setResizable on the JDialog instance to change this property. The returned JDialog will be set up such that once it is closed, or the user clicks on one of the buttons, the optionpane's value property will be set accordingly and the dialog will be closed. Each time the dialog is made visible, it will reset the option pane's value property to JOptionPane.UNINITIALIZED_VALUE to ensure the user's subsequent action closes the dialog properly.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回带有指定标题的新的无父母 JDialog 。返回的 JDialog 不会由用户调整大小，但是程序可以在 JDialog 实例上调用 setResizable 来更改此属性。返回的 JDialog 将被设置为关闭后或用户单击其中一个按钮时，将相应地设置optionpane的value属性，并关闭对话框。每次使对话框可见时，它将选择窗格的value属性重置为 JOptionPane.UNINITIALIZED_VALUE 以确保用户的后续操作正确关闭对话框。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a sample TreeModel.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个示例 TreeModel 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a sample TreeModel. Used primarily for beanbuilders to show something interesting.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个示例 TreeModel 。主要用于beanbuilder来显示一些有趣的东西。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an Action used to play a sound.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个用于播放声音的 Action 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an AttributeList responding to a new attribute.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 AttributeList 的应对新的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an Element.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 Element 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an Entity.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 Entity 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enumeration that follows the path from ancestor to this node.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个枚举，该枚举遵循从 ancestor 到此节点的路径。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enumeration that follows the path from ancestor to this node. The enumeration's nextElement() method first returns ancestor, then the child of ancestor that is an ancestor of this node, and so on, and finally returns this node. Creation of the enumeration is O(m) where m is the number of nodes between this node and ancestor, inclusive. Each nextElement() message is O(1).
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个枚举，该枚举遵循从 ancestor 到此节点的路径。枚举的 nextElement() 方法首先返回 ancestor ，然后返回作为该节点的祖先的 ancestor 的孩子，依此类推，最后返回此节点。枚举的创建是O（m），其中m是此节点与 ancestor 之间的节点数（含）。每个 nextElement() 消息均为O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enumeration that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in breadth-first order.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个枚举,该枚举以广度优先的顺序遍历以该节点为根的子树。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enumeration that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in breadth-first order. The first node returned by the enumeration's nextElement() method is this node.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个枚举，该枚举以广度优先的顺序遍历以此节点为根的子树。枚举的 nextElement() 方法返回的第一个节点是该节点。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enumeration that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in depth-first order.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个枚举,该枚举以深度优先的顺序遍历以该节点为根的子树。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enumeration that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in depth-first order. The first node returned by the enumeration's nextElement() method is the leftmost leaf. This is the same as a postorder traversal.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个枚举，该枚举以深度优先的顺序遍历此节点处的子树。枚举的 nextElement() 方法返回的第一个节点是最左边的叶子。这与后遍历相同。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enumeration that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in postorder.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回按后序遍历以该节点为根的子树的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enumeration that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in postorder. The first node returned by the enumeration's nextElement() method is the leftmost leaf. This is the same as a depth-first traversal.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个枚举，该枚举以事后顺序遍历以该节点为根的子树。枚举的 nextElement() 方法返回的第一个节点是最左边的叶子。这与深度优先遍历相同。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enumeration that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in preorder.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个遍历以这个节点为根的子树的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an enumeration that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in preorder. The first node returned by the enumeration's nextElement() method is this node.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个枚举，该枚举以预定顺序遍历以此节点为根的子树。枚举的 nextElement() 方法返回的第一个节点是该节点。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an instance of DefaultMetalTheme.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回 DefaultMetalTheme 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an instance of JInternalFrame.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回 JInternalFrame 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an instance of JInternalFrame. The internal frame is created with the specified title, and wrapping the JOptionPane. The returned JInternalFrame is added to the JDesktopPane ancestor of parentComponent, or components parent if one its ancestors isn't a JDesktopPane, or if parentComponent doesn't have a parent then a RuntimeException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回 JInternalFrame 的实例。使用指定的标题创建内部框架，并包装 JOptionPane 。返回的 JInternalFrame 被添加到 parentComponent 的 JDesktopPane 祖先，如果其祖先不是 JDesktopPane ，则将其添加到父项，或者如果 parentComponent 没有父项，则抛出 RuntimeException 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an instance of TreeModelHandler.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回 TreeModelHandler 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an instance of TreeModelHandler. The returned object is responsible for updating the expanded state when the TreeModel changes.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回 TreeModelHandler 的实例。当 TreeModel 更改时，返回的对象负责更新扩展状态。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an instance of TabSet.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回TabSet的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an instance of TabSet. The array of Tabs passed in must be sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个TabSet实例。传入的Tabs数组必须按升序排列。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an updater for objects with the given field.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回给定字段的对象的更新器。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an updater for objects with the given field. The Class argument is needed to check that reflective types and generic types match.
trans-unit.target: 为给定字段的对象创建并返回一个更新器。类参数用于检查反射类型和通用类型是否匹配。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an updater for objects with the given field. The Class arguments are needed to check that reflective types and generic types match.
trans-unit.target: 为具有给定字段的对象创建并返回一个更新器。类参数用于检查反射类型和通用类型是否匹配。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns the object responsible for updating the treestate when nodes expanded state changes.
trans-unit.target: 当节点扩展状态发生变化时,创建并返回负责更新树状状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates buttons.
trans-unit.target: 创建按钮。

trans-unit.source: Creates default cell editors for objects, numbers, and boolean values.
trans-unit.target: 创建对象、数字和布尔值的默认单元格编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Creates default cell renderers for objects, numbers, doubles, dates, booleans, and icons.
trans-unit.target: 为对象、数字、双数、日期、布尔值和图标创建默认的单元格渲染器。

trans-unit.source: Creates default columns for the table from the data model using the getColumnCount method defined in the TableModel interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TableModel 接口中定义的 getColumnCount 方法从数据模型中为表创建默认列。

trans-unit.source: Creates document parser with the specified dtd.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 dtd 创建文档解析器。

trans-unit.source: Creates either a stream or a datagram socket.
trans-unit.target: 创建流或数据报套接字。

trans-unit.source: Creates elliptic curve domain parameters based on the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定值创建椭圆曲线域参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates new SyncFactoryException without detail message.
trans-unit.target: 创建没有详细信息的新 SyncFactoryException 。

trans-unit.source: Creates one or more complex, flipping buffers with the given capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个或多个复杂的、具有给定功能的翻转缓冲器。

trans-unit.source: Creates parser with the specified dtd.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 dtd 创建解析器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the Choice's peer.
trans-unit.target: 创建 Choice 的对等方。

trans-unit.source: Creates the Choice's peer. This peer allows us to change the look of the Choice without changing its functionality.
trans-unit.target: 创建 Choice 的对等方。该对等方允许我们更改 Choice 的外观，而无需更改其功能。

trans-unit.source: Creates the ComponentUI implementation for the passed in component.
trans-unit.target: 为传入的组件创建 ComponentUI 实现。

trans-unit.source: Creates the ComponentUI objects required to present the target component, placing the objects in the uis vector and returning the ComponentUI object that best represents the component's UI.
trans-unit.target: 创建呈现 target 组件所需的 ComponentUI 对象，将对象放置在 uis 向量中，并返回最能代表组件UI的 ComponentUI 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates the ComponentUI objects required to present the target component, placing the objects in the uis vector and returning the ComponentUI object that best represents the component's UI. This method finds the ComponentUI objects by invoking getDefaults().getUI(target) on each default and auxiliary look and feel currently in use. The first UI object this method adds to the uis vector is for the default look and feel.
trans-unit.target: 创建呈现 target 组件所需的 ComponentUI 对象，将对象放置在 uis 向量中，并返回最能代表组件UI的 ComponentUI 对象。此方法通过在当前使用的每个默认外观和辅助外观上调用 getDefaults().getUI(target) 来查找 ComponentUI 对象。此方法添加到 uis 向量的第一个UI对象是用于默认外观。

trans-unit.source: Creates the DragSourceContext to handle the current drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建 DragSourceContext 以处理当前的拖动操作。

trans-unit.source: Creates the EditorKit to use by default.
trans-unit.target: 创建默认使用的 EditorKit 。

trans-unit.source: Creates the EditorKit to use by default. This is implemented to return javax.swing.text.StyledEditorKit.
trans-unit.target: 创建默认使用的 EditorKit 。这是为了返回 javax.swing.text.StyledEditorKit 而实现的。

trans-unit.source: Creates the Scrollbar's peer.
trans-unit.target: 创建 Scrollbar 的对等体。

trans-unit.source: Creates the Scrollbar's peer. The peer allows you to modify the appearance of the Scrollbar without changing any of its functionality.
trans-unit.target: 创建 Scrollbar 的对等体。同级允许您修改 Scrollbar 的外观而无需更改其任何功能。

trans-unit.source: Creates the TextArea's peer.
trans-unit.target: 创建 TextArea 的对等方。

trans-unit.source: Creates the TextArea's peer. The peer allows us to modify the appearance of the TextArea without changing any of its functionality.
trans-unit.target: 创建 TextArea 的对等方。同级允许我们修改 TextArea 的外观而无需更改其任何功能。

trans-unit.source: Creates the DropTargetContext associated with this DropTarget.
trans-unit.target: 创建与此DropTarget相关联的DropTargetContext。

trans-unit.source: Creates the DropTargetContext associated with this DropTarget. Subclasses may override this method to instantiate their own DropTargetContext subclass. This call is typically *only* called by the platform's DropTargetContextPeer as a drag operation encounters this DropTarget. Accessing the Context while no Drag is current has undefined results.
trans-unit.target: 创建与此DropTarget相关联的DropTargetContext。子类可以重写此方法来实例化自己的DropTargetContext子类。当拖动操作遇到此DropTarget时,此调用通常只由平台的DropTargetContextPeer*调用。在当前没有拖动时访问上下文会产生未定义的结果。

trans-unit.source: Creates the HijrahEra object from the numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 从数值中创建HijrahEra对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates the HijrahEra object from the numeric value. The Hijrah calendar system has only one era covering the proleptic years greater than zero. This method returns the singleton HijrahEra for the value 1.
trans-unit.target: 根据数值创建 HijrahEra 对象。Hijrah日历系统只有一个时代,涵盖大于0的闰年。本方法返回值为1的单人HijrahEra。

trans-unit.source: Creates the JList used in the popup to display the items in the combo box model.
trans-unit.target: 创建弹出窗口中使用的JList,以显示组合框模型中的项目。

trans-unit.source: Creates the JList used in the popup to display the items in the combo box model. This method is called when the UI class is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建弹出窗口中使用的JList,以显示组合框模型中的项目。该方法在创建UI类时被调用。

trans-unit.source: Creates the Panel's peer.
trans-unit.target: 创建小组的同行。

trans-unit.source: Creates the Panel's peer. The peer allows you to modify the appearance of the panel without changing its functionality.
trans-unit.target: 创建人机界面的对等体。对等体允许你修改人机的外观而不改变其功能。

trans-unit.source: Creates the Synth look and feel ComponentUI for the passed in JComponent.
trans-unit.target: 为传入的 JComponent 创建Synth外观 ComponentUI 。

trans-unit.source: Creates the TextField's peer.
trans-unit.target: 创建TextField的同行。

trans-unit.source: Creates the TextField's peer. The peer allows us to modify the appearance of the TextField without changing its functionality.
trans-unit.target: 创建TextField的对等体。该同行允许我们修改TextField的外观而不改变其功能。

trans-unit.source: Creates the UI.
trans-unit.target: 创建用户界面。

trans-unit.source: Creates the actual value retrieved from the UIDefaults table.
trans-unit.target: 创建从 UIDefaults 表检索的实际值。

trans-unit.source: Creates the actual value retrieved from the UIDefaults table. When an object that implements this interface is retrieved from the table, this method is used to create the real value, which is then stored in the table and returned to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: 创建从 UIDefaults 表检索的实际值。从表中检索实现此接口的对象时，将使用此方法创建实际值，然后将其存储在表中并返回到调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates the appropriate object to represent msg and places it into container.
trans-unit.target: 创建表示 msg 的适当对象并将其放入 container 。

trans-unit.source: Creates the appropriate object to represent msg and places it into container. If msg is an instance of Component, it is added directly; if it is an Icon, a JLabel is created to represent it; otherwise, a JLabel is created for the string. If msg is an Object[], this method will be recursively invoked for the children. internallyCreated is true if msg is an instance of Component and was created internally by this method (this is used to correctly set hasCustomComponents only if internallyCreated is false).
trans-unit.target: 创建表示 msg 的适当对象并将其放入 container 。如果 msg 是 Component 的一个实例，则将其直接添加；否则，它将直接添加。如果它是一个 Icon ，则创建一个 JLabel 来表示它；否则，将为该字符串创建一个 JLabel 。如果 msg 是Object []，则将为子级递归调用此方法。 internallyCreated 是 true 如果 msg 是的实例 Component 和通过该方法内部创建的（这被用来正确地设定 hasCustomComponents 仅当 internallyCreated 为 false ）。

trans-unit.source: Creates the appropriate object to represent each of the objects in buttons and adds it to container.
trans-unit.target: 创建适当的对象来表示 buttons 每个对象，并将其添加到 container 。

trans-unit.source: Creates the appropriate object to represent each of the objects in buttons and adds it to container. This differs from addMessageComponents in that it will recurse on buttons and that if button is not a Component it will create an instance of JButton.
trans-unit.target: 创建适当的对象来表示 buttons 每个对象，并将其添加到 container 。这与addMessageComponents的不同之处在于它将在 buttons 递归，并且如果button不是Component，它将创建JButton的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates the back buffers
trans-unit.target: 创建后置缓冲器

trans-unit.source: Creates the border listener.
trans-unit.target: 创建边界监听器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the chronology era object from the numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 从数值中创建年表时代对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates the container to manage placement of editingComponent.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个容器来管理 editingComponent 的放置。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default divider.
trans-unit.target: 创建默认的分隔线。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default editor kit (PlainEditorKit) for when the component is first created.
trans-unit.target: 为首次创建组件创建默认的编辑器工具包（ PlainEditorKit ）。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default editor that will be used in editable combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 创建将用于可编辑组合框的默认编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default editor that will be used in editable combo boxes. A default editor will be used only if an editor has not been explicitly set with setEditor.
trans-unit.target: 创建将在可编辑组合框中使用的默认编辑器。仅当未使用 setEditor 显式设置编辑器时，才使用默认编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default implementation of the model to be used at construction if one isn't explicitly given.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有明确给出模型的默认实现,则创建模型的默认实现,以便在构建时使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default implementation of the model to be used at construction if one isn't explicitly given. A new instance of PlainDocument is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有明确给出模型的默认实现,则创建模型的默认实现,并在构建时使用。返回一个新的PlainDocument实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default implementation of the model to be used at construction if one isn't explicitly given. An instance of PlainDocument is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未明确给出模型，则创建要在构造时使用的模型的默认实现。返回 PlainDocument 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default renderer that will be used in a non-editiable combo box.
trans-unit.target: 创建将在不可编辑的组合框中使用的默认渲染器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default renderer that will be used in a non-editiable combo box. A default renderer will used only if a renderer has not been explicitly set with setRenderer.
trans-unit.target: 创建将在不可编辑的组合框中使用的默认渲染器。仅当未使用 setRenderer 显式设置渲染器时，才会使用默认渲染器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default sort key for an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 为一个属性创建默认的排序键。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default sort key for an attribute. Entries will be sorted according to the specified attribute in ascending order using the ordering matching rule defined for use with that attribute.
trans-unit.target: 为一个属性创建默认的排序键。条目将根据指定的属性按升序排列,使用为该属性定义的排序匹配规则。

trans-unit.source: Creates the desktop manager.
trans-unit.target: 创建桌面管理器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the directory named by this abstract pathname, including any necessary but nonexistent parent directories.
trans-unit.target: 创建由这个抽象路径名命名的目录,包括任何必要但不存在的父目录。

trans-unit.source: Creates the directory named by this abstract pathname, including any necessary but nonexistent parent directories. Note that if this operation fails it may have succeeded in creating some of the necessary parent directories.
trans-unit.target: 创建由这个抽象路径名命名的目录,包括任何必要但不存在的父目录。请注意,如果该操作失败,它可能已经成功创建了一些必要的父目录。

trans-unit.source: Creates the directory named by this abstract pathname.
trans-unit.target: 创建由这个抽象路径名命名的目录。

trans-unit.source: Creates the east pane.
trans-unit.target: 创建东窗事发。

trans-unit.source: Creates the file dialog's peer.
trans-unit.target: 创建文件对话框的对等体。

trans-unit.source: Creates the file dialog's peer. The peer allows us to change the look of the file dialog without changing its functionality.
trans-unit.target: 创建文件对话框的对等体。该同行允许我们改变文件对话框的外观,而不改变其功能。

trans-unit.source: Creates the focus listener for handling keyboard navigation in the JTable.
trans-unit.target: 创建焦点侦听器以处理 JTable 中的键盘导航。

trans-unit.source: Creates the internal editor component.
trans-unit.target: 创建内部编辑器组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the internal editor component. Override this to provide a custom implementation.
trans-unit.target: 创建内部编辑器组件。重写这个组件以提供一个自定义的实现。

trans-unit.source: Creates the internal frame listener.
trans-unit.target: 创建内部帧监听器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the key listener for handling keyboard navigation in the JTable.
trans-unit.target: 创建键侦听器以处理 JTable 中的键盘导航。

trans-unit.source: Creates the key listener that will be added to the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 创建将被添加到组合框中的密钥监听器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the key listener that will be added to the combo box. If this method returns null then it will not be added to the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 创建将被添加到组合框中的键监听器,如果此方法返回null,则不会被添加到组合框中。如果本方法返回null,那么它将不会被添加到组合框中。

trans-unit.source: Creates the keymap to use for the text component, and installs any necessary bindings into it.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于文本组件的键图,并将任何必要的绑定安装到其中。

trans-unit.source: Creates the keymap to use for the text component, and installs any necessary bindings into it. By default, the keymap is shared between all instances of this type of TextUI. The keymap has the name defined by the getKeymapName method. If the keymap is not found, then DEFAULT_KEYMAP from JTextComponent is used.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于文本组件的keymap,并将任何必要的绑定安装到其中。默认情况下,keymap在TextUI的所有实例之间共享。keymap的名称由getKeymapName方法定义。如果没有找到keymap,则使用JTextComponent中的DEFAULT_KEYMAP。

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout manager.
trans-unit.target: 创建布局管理器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the listener responsible for getting key events from the tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建监听器,负责从树中获取关键事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the listener responsible for getting property change events from the selection model.
trans-unit.target: 创建监听器,负责从选择模型中获取属性变化事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the listener responsible for updating the selection based on mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 创建监听器,负责根据鼠标事件更新选择。

trans-unit.source: Creates the listener that updates the display based on selection change methods.
trans-unit.target: 创建监听器,根据选择更改方法更新显示。

trans-unit.source: Creates the menu bar's peer.
trans-unit.target: 创建菜单栏的同行。

trans-unit.source: Creates the menu bar's peer. The peer allows us to change the appearance of the menu bar without changing any of the menu bar's functionality.
trans-unit.target: 创建菜单栏的对等体。该同行允许我们改变菜单栏的外观,而不改变菜单栏的任何功能。

trans-unit.source: Creates the menu item's peer.
trans-unit.target: 创建菜单项的同行。

trans-unit.source: Creates the menu item's peer. The peer allows us to modify the appearance of the menu item without changing its functionality.
trans-unit.target: 创建菜单项的同行。同伴允许我们修改菜单项的外观而不改变其功能。

trans-unit.source: Creates the menu's peer.
trans-unit.target: 创建菜单的同行。

trans-unit.source: Creates the menu's peer. The peer allows us to modify the appearance of the menu without changing its functionality.
trans-unit.target: 创建菜单的对等体。该同行允许我们修改菜单的外观而不改变其功能。

trans-unit.source: Creates the model.
trans-unit.target: 创建模型。

trans-unit.source: Creates the mouse listener for the JTable.
trans-unit.target: 为 JTable 创建鼠标侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the mouse listener for the JTableHeader.
trans-unit.target: 为 JTableHeader 创建鼠标侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Creates the mouse motion listener which will be added to the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 创建鼠标运动监听器,它将被添加到组合框中。

trans-unit.source: Creates the mouse motion listener which will be added to the combo box. Warning: When overriding this method, make sure to maintain the existing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 创建鼠标运动侦听器，该侦听器将添加到组合框中。警告：重写此方法时，请确保维持现有行为。

trans-unit.source: Creates the new JarURLConnection to the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的URL创建新的JarURLConnection。

trans-unit.source: Creates the non rollover border for toolbar components.
trans-unit.target: 为工具栏组件创建非滚动边框。

trans-unit.source: Creates the non rollover border for toolbar components. This border will be installed as the border for components added to the toolbar if rollover borders are not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 为工具栏组件创建非滚动边框。如果没有启用滚动边框,该边框将被安装为添加到工具栏的组件的边框。

trans-unit.source: Creates the north pane.
trans-unit.target: 创建北窗格。

trans-unit.source: Creates the object responsible for managing what is expanded, as well as the size of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 创建对象,负责管理扩展的内容以及节点的大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates the object to use for a caret.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于插图的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates the object to use for a caret. By default an instance of BasicCaret is created. This method can be redefined to provide something else that implements the InputPosition interface or a subclass of JCaret.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于caret的对象。默认情况下,会创建一个BasicCaret的实例。这个方法可以被重新定义,以提供其他实现 InputPosition 接口的对象或 JCaret 的子类。

trans-unit.source: Creates the object to use for adding highlights.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于添加高光的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates the object to use for adding highlights. By default an instance of BasicHighlighter is created. This method can be redefined to provide something else that implements the Highlighter interface or a subclass of DefaultHighlighter.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于添加高光的对象。默认情况下,会创建一个BasicHighlighter的实例。这个方法可以被重新定义,以提供其他实现Highlighter接口的对象或DefaultHighlighter的子类。
